channel.title: Toxic on Silence Speaks
channel.description: Recent content in Toxic on Silence Speaks

item.title: Asphyxiate
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: I stopped myself To take a breather, But I took it far too late. My reluctant lungs Could hardly handle The second-hand sadness Yours create. Each blessing that falls Into your hand Soon meets its match And asphyxiates.
